intro.welcome: Hey~ Welcome to our fingertip universe! âœ¨

description.c: hidden near Hongdae's Cherry Blossom Street, dedicated to curing all kinds of "bad moods" and "empty-hand syndrome"~ğŸŒ¸

service.a: Here, you can leisurely choose colors, styles, or even chat about anything while getting your nails done, after all,
service.b: time is yours, and beauty belongs only to you ğŸ’….

owner.title: A Word from the Owner
owner.intro: I'm the founder & exclusive dream-maker of this salon (just call me boss lady ğŸ˜)
owner.childhood: Since childhood, I've adored dressing up. I'd paint my hands with mom's nail polish, feeling absolutely gorgeous!
owner.background: I came to Korea alone in high school, starting from zero due to the language barrier, but my love for beauty never changed!
owner.education: I graduated from Seokyeong University with a major in Beauty & Hair Design. Since high school, I've been collecting national certificates:
certificates: And countless practice-hand models accompanying me through sleepless nights
owner.experience: During the pandemic, I juggled classes and freelance work to support myself and pay tuition. Step by step, I went from a novice to a professional nail technician, making countless international friends along the wayâ€”it was truly rewarding.
owner.achievement: After five years, I've finally opened my own little salon! ğŸ‰

specialFeatures.title: What Makes Us Special
features: ğŸŒ¸ Located beside Cherry Blossom Roadâ€”just open the door for a perfect springtime snapshot
ğŸ’… Personalized nail art thatâ€™s unique each visit
ğŸ§ Quiet and cozyâ€”chat or relax, your choice
ğŸ’– Y2K, dopamine, sweet & cool girl vibesâ€”all styles available!
ğŸ Little surprises every timeâ€”we just love being creative!
ğŸ«¶ We're never in a hurry; your happiness is what matters most

mission.title: Our Philosophy

quote.a: "There's no such thing as the best manicure,
quote.b: only endless service and genuine friendship!"

mission.message: Behind every pair of hands is a hardworking you. I hope to become your little "happiness machine" when you need it most ğŸˆ
closing: Even if you're not here for nails, stop by for coffee and a chat~
Because we're more than a nail salonâ€”we're your daily dose of happinessâœ¨
